attributes.action: All Car tax revenue to be spent on road inspection & repairs only. untill all roads in Great Britain are fit for purpose,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The roads are unfit for safe usage in all county's within Great Britain. there needs to be a bit more urgency from the government on this issue.for many years now road tax payers have noticed the neglect of our roads. in a lot of cases these roads are not only dangerous but embarrassing. I think if any more accidents caused by bad road Maintenance/Neglect  the government should be held responsible and the persons involved taken to court and then sacked. never to be a government official again.
